name: Red River Valley - original abstract painting on recycled wood
description:
Small but bold eco-friendly art for your home or office.

Title: Red River Valley
Size: about 3.5” square, .75” thick
Other Details: done with acrylic paint on recycled scrap wood in my Pennsylvania studio.  All sealer/varnish and paint used are non-toxic.  This piece is signed, wired, and ready to hang.

Because of the size, this piece would also look perfect placed on a bookshelf or mantle.   

Please note I tried to capture the colors accurately but color hues and tones appear different from monitor to monitor. 

Copyright ©2013 Staunch Studio All Rights Reserved. Any use of an image on this site without express written consent from the artist is prohibited.



*Don’t hang this in direct sunlight and to clean, wipe with a dry cloth.

name: fausses larmes - original abstract painting on paper
description:
Title: fausses larmes
Size: 5"x7"
Other Details: done with acrylic paint on Strathmore Acrylic linen canvas paper (246lb) in my Pennsylvania studio.  All sealer/varnish and paint used are non-toxic.  This piece is signed on the front and signed, titled, and dated on the back.   

*You will not receive this painting framed-the painting will be shipped in a cardboard sandwich to protect it in it's travels.

Please note I tried to capture the colors accurately but color hues and tones appear different from monitor to monitor. 

Copyright ©2012 Staunch Studio All Rights Reserved. Any use of an image on this site without express written consent from the artist is prohibited.
